languages.text: {n}В момент, когда Фалько отворачивается от стола, вы видите зверскую гримасу ненависти, исказившую его и без того отталкивающие черты.{/n}
{n}As Falco turns away from the table, you see a snarl of feral hatred twist his already repulsive features.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В момент, когда Фалько отворачивается от стола, вы видите зверскую гримасу ненависти, исказившую его и без того отталкивающие черты.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}As Falco turns away from the table, you see a snarl of feral hatred twist his already repulsive features.{/n}
{n}As Falco turns away from the table, you see a snarl of feral hatred twist his already repulsive features.{/n}
{n}As Falco turns away from the table, you see a snarl of feral hatred twist his already repulsive features.{/n}
{n}As Falco turns away from the table, you see a snarl of feral hatred twist his already repulsive features.{/n}

languages.text: {n}当法尔科转过身离开桌子时，你看到他原本就令人望而生厌的脸上露出了一抹扭曲的恨意。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As Falco turns away from the table, you see a snarl of feral hatred twist his already repulsive features.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当法尔科转过身离开桌子时，你看到他原本就令人望而生厌的脸上露出了一抹扭曲的恨意。{/n}

languages.text: {n}ファルコがテーブルから背を向けると、ただでさえ嫌悪感を抱かせる彼の顔に、獰猛な憎悪の唸り声が浮かんだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As Falco turns away from the table, you see a snarl of feral hatred twist his already repulsive features.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ファルコがテーブルから背を向けると、ただでさえ嫌悪感を抱かせる彼の顔に、獰猛な憎悪の唸り声が浮かんだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cuando Falco se aleja de la mesa, ves que un gruñido de odio salvaje retuerce sus ya repulsivas facciones.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As Falco turns away from the table, you see a snarl of feral hatred twist his already repulsive features.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cuando Falco se aleja de la mesa, ves que un gruñido de odio salvaje retuerce sus ya repulsivas facciones.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Lorsque Falco se détourne de la table, vous remarquez une grimace de haine viscérale qui déforme encore plus son visage déjà particulièrement laid.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As Falco turns away from the table, you see a snarl of feral hatred twist his already repulsive features.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Lorsque Falco se détourne de la table, vous remarquez une grimace de haine viscérale qui déforme encore plus son visage déjà particulièrement laid.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Falco zieht von dannen, aber du siehst, wie brutaler Hass in ihm aufsteigt und sein ohnehin schon abstoßendes Gesicht noch weiter entstellt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As Falco turns away from the table, you see a snarl of feral hatred twist his already repulsive features.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Falco zieht von dannen, aber du siehst, wie brutaler Hass in ihm aufsteigt und sein ohnehin schon abstoßendes Gesicht noch weiter entstellt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Falco dönüp masadan ayrılıyor. Zaten antipatik olan yüz hatlarına yırtıcı bir nefretin kıvrılıp yerleştiğini görüyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As Falco turns away from the table, you see a snarl of feral hatred twist his already repulsive features.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Falco dönüp masadan ayrılırken, zaten antipatik olan yüz hatlarına yırtıcı bir nefretin kıvrılıp yerleştiğini görüyorsun.{/n}
